mapper.insert: INSERT INTO spring.order_detail (ord_id, mem_id, prod_id, opt_prod_id, code_name, prod_name, prod_qty, prod_tot_price, pack_type, rg_num, md_num) VALUES (#{ord_id},#{mem_id},#{prod_id},#{opt_prod_id},#{code_name},#{prod_name},#{prod_qty},#{prod_tot_price},#{pack_type},#{rg_num},#{md_num})
mapper.select: SELECT pi.upld_path FROM product_image pi JOIN order_detail od ON pi.prd_id = od.prod_id WHERE od.ord_det_id = #{ord_det_id}
select od.*, m.mem_name from order_detail as od join code_table as ct on od.code_name = ct.code_name left join member as m on od.mem_id = m.mem_id where ct.code_type = 1 order by od.ord_det_id desc
SELECT * FROM spring.order_detail ORDER BY rg_date DESC, ord_id DESC
